caption:
This photograph depicts a riverside scene under overcast skies. The main features include:

- Water Body: A broad expanse of shimmering water occupies the foreground, with sunlight reflecting off its surface, suggesting either early morning or late afternoon illumination.

- Vegetation: To the left foreground, a solitary tree with thin branches and light foliage stands partially submerged in the water, indicating a possible high water level or a regularly flooded area.

- Industrial Setting: In the background across the river, an industrial landscape is visible. Prominent are multiple box-like buildings and tall chimney stacks emitting smoke, contributing to an atmosphere of industrial activity.

- Bridge: On the right side of the background, a long bridge spans the river. Its structure includes several arches and appears to be a truss bridge, typical of many used for both rail and road traffic.

- Sky and Clouds: The sky takes up the upper third of the photograph, filled with thick clouds that block most of the direct sunlight, creating a flat and diffuse light over the entire scene.

Overall, the composition contrasts the natural elements in the foreground against the man-made industrial and infrastructural elements in the background, framed under a dramatic, expansive sky.
title: Looking toward Peoria from Cooper Park in East Peoria across the flood waters of the Illinois River
